messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: We can protect the planet and at the same time create jobs and wealth. But to do this needs bold ideas, strong commitment and political will.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure all our homes are well insulated, wasting less energy and reducing bills
Promote local services with fair funding
Protect green spaces for all to use

mentions.candidate: Jon is a dedicated campaigner who has worked for many years for a safer, healthier future, and as a Green MP will fight to...

issues.environment: We can protect the planet and at the same time create jobs and wealth.

housing.content: Ensure all our homes are well insulated, wasting less energy and reducing bills

leaflet.personalStatement: Jon is a dedicated campaigner who has worked for many years for a safer, healthier future, and as a Green MP will fight to...

quotes.text: Time and again the major parties make short-sighted decisions based on increased growth regardless of long-term morale decisions based on quality of life.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Printed on 100% recycled paper using sustainable technologies that do not harm the environment.
